articles.author: Coin Desk
articles.summary: Coinbase is considering listing BNB for a listing and China Merchants Bank International is tokenizing a MMF on the BNB Chain. The price action is driven partly by the possibility of BNB being listed and the prospect of the MMF being tokenized.

articles.title: Embrace Rapid Cryptocurrency Market Shifts with CryptoAppsy
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: CryptoAppsy offers extensive real-time crypto market data and customizable alerts. It has a unique multi-currency support and offers multi-lingual support for different crypto-currencies. It also offers customisable alerts for different currencies. It's a free service.
